quotes.quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: To practice any art, no matter how well or badly, is a way to make your soul grow. So do it.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: An idea that is not dangerous is unworthy of being called an idea at all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Imagination is the beginning of creation. You imagine what you desire, you will what you imagine, and at last, you create what you will.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: The chief enemy of creativity is 'good' sense.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: The painter has the Universe in his mind and hands.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Creativity is a wild mind and a disciplined eye.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: The desire to create is one of the deepest yearnings of the human soul.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
